deformablemesh.util.connectedcomponents

Class ConnectedComponents2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • deformablemesh.util.connectedcomponents.ConnectedComponents2D

  • public class ConnectedComponents2D
extends Object
    Connect components for 2D. Connectivity is assumed to be 4 fold, eg connected pixes are neighbors either directly above or below.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectedComponents2D(ij.process.ImageProcessor proc)
      Prepares a workspace for performing a connect components routine on the provided image.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns the centroids associated with this connected components.

      A map of label -> region for all of the connected components.
      int getWidth() 
      void label(int[] p, int label)
      Moves the unlabelled pixel to a labelled region.
      static void main(String[] args) 
      void process()
      This method needs to be called before any of the centroids can be accessed.
      void removeRegion(int label)
      Removes a region from this cc2d by removing the label from the map, and setting all of the pixels associated with the provided label to 0.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectedComponents2D

        public ConnectedComponents2D(ij.process.ImageProcessor proc)
        Prepares a workspace for performing a connect components routine on the provided image. The image should already be thresholded, so any non-zero value will be treated as foreground, and 0 is background. This image will be modified.
        Parameters:
        proc - thresholded image that will be modified during processing.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public void process()
        This method needs to be called before any of the centroids can be accessed.

      • getCentroids

        public List<double[]> getCentroids()
        Returns the centroids associated with this connected components. If this cc2d has not been process processed, then it will be.
        Returns:
        a list of center of regions.

      • get

        public int get(int x,
               int y)

      • getRegions

        public Map<Integer,List<int[]>> getRegions()
        A map of label -> region for all of the connected components. If this cc2d has not been processed it will be processed. Otherwise it will return the previous results.
        Returns:
        Labe to Region.

      • removeRegion

        public void removeRegion(int label)
        Removes a region from this cc2d by removing the label from the map, and setting all of the pixels associated with the provided label to 0.
        Parameters:
        label -

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)

      • get

        public int get(int i)

      • label

        public void label(int[] p,
                  int label)
        Moves the unlabelled pixel to a labelled region. Add the int[] to the collection associated with the label. updates the backing workspace.
        Parameters:
        p - {x, y}
        label - region to be associated with.
